meanings.definition: Letting go of something held in the hand.
meanings.sent1: The child was unhanding the toy to share it with his friend.
meanings.sent2: She unhanding the rope and the boat drifted away from the dock.
meanings.sent3: The chef was unhanding the knife after preparing the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The hiker unhanding the map, trusting his instincts to guide him.
